casebody.data:
Tracy C. BRICKEY and Brandy Brickey, Plaintiffs-Appellees,
v.
Vincent Lavon MCCARVER and CR Motors of Adrian, Inc., Defendants-Appellants. SC: 158060
COA: 337448 Supreme Court of Michigan. September 14, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of defendants-appellants to extend the time for filing their reply is GRANTED. The reply submitted on September 10, 2018, is accepted for filing.
